pages.text: The Building Gadget is a fantastic device that can greatly speed up building. Shift-right-click to select a block to use, and use the Settings Menu keybind to configure the placement. It must be charged in a $(l:electric_machines/charging_station)Charging Station$().
The Exchanging Gadget works in a similar way, except it replaces blocks already in the world. This can be useful if you're making your factory in a cave, for instance.
